thread.title: Samantha Bee's Show Tells You What Trump Knew And When He Knew It
thread.title_full: Samantha Bee's Show Tells You What Trump Knew And When He Knew It

author: Ron Dicker
title: Samantha Bee's Show Tells You What Trump Knew And When He Knew It
text:
Samantha Bee's Show Tells You What Trump Knew And When He Knew It The Michael Flynn debacle is only the latest. 02/15/2017 07:40 am ET Ron Dicker General Assignment Reporter, The Huffington Post 
Are you confused about President Donald Trump ’s role in the debacle that led national security adviser Michael Flynn to resign over his premature sanction discussions with Russia? 
Let “Full Frontal with Samantha Bee” spell it out for you, along with answering a few other questions about the commander-in-chief’s prior knowledge of stuff. — Full Frontal (@FullFrontalSamB) February 14, 2017 Also on HuffPost
